Notes.Text:
This update for python-scipy fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-25399: Fixed minor refcounting issue in Py_FindObjects (bsc#1213062).
- CVE-2023-29824: Fixed use-after-free in Py_FindObjects (bsc#1213137).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A refcounting issue which leads to potential memory leak was discovered in scipy commit 8627df31ab in Py_FindObjects() function.

Vulnerabilities.Description: ** DISPUTED ** A use-after-free issue was discovered in Py_FindObjects() function in SciPy versions prior to 1.8.0. NOTE: the vendor and discoverer indicate that this is not a security issue.
